page.title: 09DAIRSIE YOUTH CLUB
page.content: The Youth Club meets every Wednesday at 7.00 p.m. except school holidays when it is closed. We have all sorts of activities - some indoors, some outdoors, and we occasionally go on outings with the group. There are about 20 people that go to the Youth Club. The Youth Club is run by Amy Hain who is helped by Mrs. Miller who is in charge of the tuck shop where we buy sweets, crisps and juice. In the Youth Club we have a record player and Duncan Pentland usually brings records to play. We have competitions every year, and we have different games. The prizes are medals. We have all sorts of games - board games and ball games, darts etc. Occasionally we go on three-legged charity walks and sponsored silences and some Wednesdays we play rounders at the park.- Fraser Watson, Mark Birnie, Dawn Davidson.
